topLocations.head: Top Locations
topLocations.secondaryHead: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.

card1.head: London
card1.text: At its centre stand the imposing Houses of Parliament, the iconic ‘Big Ben’ clock tower and Westminster Abbey, site of British monarch coronations.

card2.head: New York
card2.text: At its core is Manhattan, a densely populated borough that’s among the world’s major commercial, financial and cultural centers

card3.head: Paris
card3.text: Eiffel Tower and Gothic Notre-Dame cathedral, the city is known for its cafe culture and designer boutiques along the Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

card4.head: Hong Kong
card4.text: Hong Kong is also a major shopping destination, famed for bespoke tailors and Temple Street Night Market.
